title.narrative: Transparency, Accountability and Right to Information Fund Project (TARIF / PROKAS)

description.narrative: The British Council, in consortium with Palladium and WISE Development, is contracted by DFID to implement the Promoting Knowledge for Accountable Systems (PROKAS) Programme in Bangladesh. PROKAS is a component part of DFID Bangladesh’s wider Transparency and Right to Information Programme. PROKAS supports government, private sector and civil society to work collectively to improve transparency and accountability in targeted thematic areas.

Northern Hub: located at Southern Hub located in Jashore district, sub-district Jashore SadarGaibandha district (Subdistrict: Gaibandha Sadar), Rangpur district (Subdistrict: Rangpur Sadar), Rajshahi district (Subdistrict: Paba) • operating at national level: for partners such as IID, C3ER, BCAS, ICCCAD • Central Hub: located at Tangail district (Subdistrict: Tangail Sadar, Kalihati, Delduar), Narsingdi district (Subdistrict: Narsingdi Sadar) • Southern Hub: located in Bomsa district (Subdistrict: Kalia, Jashore), Satkhira district (Subdistrict: Shyamanga), Khulna district (Subdistrict: Koyra), Patuakhali district (Subdistrict: Patuakhali Sadar, Dashmina, Galachipa) Bhola district (Subdistrict: Borhanuddin, Tazumuddin, Charafshion), Kushtia district (Subdistrict: Kumarkhali), Bagerhat, Jashore district, sub-district Jashore Sadar • Eastern Hub: located at Chattogram district (Subdistrict: Rangunia), Cox’s Bazar district (Subdistrict: Cox’s Bazar Sadar, Teknaf, Chakaria, Kutubdia, Chattaogram (Panchalaish Thana), Cumilla district (Subdistrict: Cumilla City Corporation)
